Topics

Overview of topics covered in this course.

  • Mesh types and discretization methods explained in this course.

Introduction to a modeling and simulation process

  • Explains the processes involved in modeling and simulation.
  • Covers: slides_02.pdf and slides_03.pdf 
  • Test your self by Modeling Process quiz

Overview of the PDE problems we encounter in this course

  • Quick presentation of the different types of PDEs that will be used in this course.
  • If you want to learn more about Navier Stokes equations and transport equations as well as the nabla operator then have a look at slides_07.pdf.
  • Test yourself if you remember enough math about derivates by this Vector Calculus quiz.

Overview of error types done in modeling and simulation

  • This video explains how the modeling process can be used to identify and investigate common sources for errors in solving a simulation problem.
